Barley-breake, or, A vvarning for vvantons. Written by W.N. Gent W. N., Gent.
[32] p.
By Simon Stafford, dwelling in the Cloth-fayre, neere the red Lyon, Printed at London : 1607.
Erroneously attributed to Nicholas Breton. In verse. Signatures: A-D⁴. Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
